homeHeader.title: Tap into Global Trade Routes, Expand Reach, & Scale Operations in Hamriyah Free Zone
homeHeader.description: Expand your business across the globe with strategic access to the Arabian Gulf, Port Khalid, Jebel Ali Port, and Sharjah International Airport. Save millions of dirhams with favourable land leasing policies, inexpensive energy, and competitive tax incentives. Trust our experts to streamline the licensing process so that you can go live in days, not months.

leftSection_1.title: Why Should You Set Up in Hamriyah Free Zone?
leftSection_1.description: Located adjacent to GCC states, HFZ empowers founders with world-class infrastructure and seamless logistical connectivity. Choose from 7 dedicated sub-zones within Hamriyah FZ to unlock state-of-the-art business facilities.

items.title: Gain Access to Global Markets
items.subTitle: Gain Access to Global Markets
items.description: Take advantage of the Hamriyah Free Zone's 3 modern seaports, deep water port, and inner harbour to discover a diverse market of over 1.5 billion consumers in the MENA region, Europe, Asia, and Africa.

items.title: Discover Exciting Tax Benefits
items.subTitle: Discover Exciting Tax Benefits
items.description: Maximise profitability with HFZA's zero import, export, income, and corporate tax, low freight charges, and 100% capital repatriation.

items.title: Browse Ready-to-Move Warehouses
items.subTitle: Browse Ready-to-Move Warehouses
items.description: Expedite business setup by browsing HFZA's extensive catalogue of robust pre-built warehouses and fully furnished office units. Choose from 220+ units and 140+ industrial land in prime business destinations.

items.title: Unlock Limitless Business Growth
items.subTitle: Unlock Limitless Business Growth
items.description: Scale your company and build your team hassle-free by qualifying for over 15 visa applications and bundling 10+ activities under a single license.

leftSection_2.title: Explore Eligible Business Activities in Hamriyah Free Zone

leftSection_3.title: Select the Best-Fit Trade License in HFZA
leftSection_3.description: Choose from diverse business licenses to find the one that best matches your business activity and legal structure:Choose from diverse business licenses to find the one that best matches your business activity and legal structure:

items.title: Industrial License
items.description: Secure warehouse and environmental approvals to fabricate, package, and distribute goods stress-free.

items.title: Commercial License
items.description: Buy, sell, store, and trade goods across the Emirates with only your passport, application, and a trade name.

items.title: Service License
items.description: Offer consultancy or business support services with minimal documentation.

items.title: General Trading License
items.description: Streamline multi-category trading by providing a product list, passport copies, and a physical office lease.

items.title: Investment License
items.description: Hold, diversify, and preserve your shares with a professional business plan and shareholder documents.

sec1.title: Thrive in One of the World's Best Free Zones
sec1.description: Ranked #2 in the ‘World’s Best Free Zone,’ Hamriyah Free Zone offers unmatched access to global trade routes, robust warehouses, and long-term leases.

sec2.title: Flexible Setup, Transparent Costs—Grow Confidently in Hamriyah Free Zone
sec2.description: Receive your Hamriyah Free Zone licensing costs built around your business setup needs. Only pay for the licenses, offices, and services you actually need—no hidden fees, no surprises.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does it take to issue a business license?
items.answer: With our experts, you can secure your HFZ trade license within 1-3 working days.

items.question: Do I need to lease a physical office to operate in Hamriyah Free Zone?
items.answer: No, you can set up your business in HFZ without leasing or renting a physical office, co-working space, or virtual office.

items.question: What is the corporate tax rate in Hamriyah FZ?
items.answer: The Hamriyah Free Zone offers businesses 0% corporate, personal income, import, and export taxes, providing unlimited savings.

items.question: Is an audit required annually for HFZ companies?
items.answer: No, Hamriyah Free Zone doesn’t require businesses to conduct annual audits, empowering you to save costs.

items.question: Does One Nexuz assist in setting up a corporate bank account in Hamriyah Free Zone?
items.answer: Yes, our expert consultants can help you set up a personal or business account in HFZA to streamline finances.
